remarks: Implicit substitution inference for general classes.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jul-1995.)
statement:
cgsex2g.1 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ch ) $.
cgsex2g.2 $e |- ( ch -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cgsex2g $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ( E. x E. y ( ch /\ ph ) <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ps x y $.
